item.title: Hugo Templates
item.description: Great Resource on getting started with blogdown https://alison.rbind.io/post/up-and-running-with-blogdown/ A bunch of great blogdown sites for inspiration https://awesome-blogdown.com/ Undefined (theme name not given!) https://www.garrickadenbuie.com/about/ Learn https://github.com/matcornic/hugo-theme-learn/ Variant of Learn = Dockdock https://docdock.netlify.com/ Beautiful Hugo https://github.com/halogenica/beautifulhugo Future Imperfect Hugo Theme Page User Site that I like https://marionlouveaux.fr/ Pros front page is most recent article great sidebar clean look Universal Theme https://github.
